column1: '''''SEVEN''''', '''Volume 20''' is a volume of ''[[SEVEN]]'', a scholarly journal published by the [[Marion E. Wade Center]].
*"Metaphysical and Romantic in the Taliessin Poems"
*"Some Views on ''Catholic Tales and Christian Songs''"
